articles.author: Josh Suttill
articles.title: Verstappen: Red Bull's been found out now car advantage is gone - The Race
articles.description: Max Verstappen says the "fundamental" problem that is thwarting Red Bull at the Monaco Grand Prix is one that has been masked by its car advantage since 2022
articles.content:
Max Verstappen says the fundamental problem thats thwarted Red Bulls Monaco Grand Prix weekend is one that has been masked by its car advantage since 2022.
